the latest integration build eclipse-SDK-20020314 running on Win2K service Pack 
2.

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable 
(java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Index out of bounds)

I try to create a comment block of the following format:

/**
 *

complete freezes the Eclipse IDE.  I cannot save as it tries to rebuild and re-
